channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The next round of bitter cold and snow will hit the southern US
item.description: The next round of bitter cold is set to envelop the southern U.S., after the first significant winter storm of the year blasted a huge swath of the country with ice, snow and wind.

item.title: Jimmy Carter will be honored in Washington, a city where he remained an outsider
Trumpâ€™s praise of Carter in death after jeering him in life deepens a contradictory relationship
